name: Yet Another Metroidvania
description:
A metroidvania prototype. Move with WASD or arrow keys.  Currently, there are only 3 levels.

Features:

  • Character that can run, jump, climb ladders and get hurt by lava
  • Basic enemy type, hopping back and forth
  • Shooting enemy type, either walking back and forth or shooting at player if within range. Their projectiles deal damage not only to the player.
  • SFX
  • Tilemap
  • Soft "god-ray" lights inspired by Hollow Knight's lighting solution

made by Pavol Pánisz
